mean_cn: n. 调查，测量，审视；  v. 调查，审视，研究，测量，勘定，环视
mean_en: an investigation of the opinions, behaviour, etc. of a particular group of people, which is usually done by asking them questions
word_etyma: sur在上面 + vey看→ survey 俯瞰，调查
sentence: The company does a survey to collect users' opinions.
sentence_trans: 这家公司做了一项调查，去收集用户的意见。
